articles.description: Anupam Mittal, Vineeta Singh, Amit Jain, and Aman Gupta, renowned investors from Shark Tank India Season 3, engaged in a lively and candid discussion with ETimes TV regarding the show. The Sharks provided insights into the latest season and shared their persp…
articles.content:
Anupam: Desh ki seva mein koi toh pista hi hai. We have teams, we are organised.
Vineeta: There’s a lot to learn. I honestly feel that being a Shark makes me a better founder of my own company.
Ami… [+640 chars]

articles.title: From Alia Bhatt to Kiara Advani: Best ethnic outfits for Basant Panchami 2024 - Times of India
articles.description: Here are some choicest of yellow outfits for Basant Panchami.
articles.content: Sara Ali Khan wore this embellished Manish Malhotra lehenga in yellow with floral embroidery and gota work. She accessorised the look with golden neckpiece.
